purpose: To provide practical guides, clients, and servers for learning and experimenting with the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
principle: Implements and demonstrates MCP through various practical examples, including client and server setups
reusability: Includes modular components and guides that can be used to set up MCP-compliant clients and servers
limitations: Being in alpha, the project may lack comprehensive documentation and stability; it is primarily for learning and experimentation
name: model-context-protocol-resources
description: Exploring the Model Context Protocol (MCP) through practical guides, clients, and servers I've built while learning about this new protocol.
highlight: Comprehensive exploration and practical implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP)
